to.sven.androidrccar.host.framework

Interface IHostFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HostFactory

    public interface IHostFactory
extends IFactory
    This factory provides creators for all classes that HostLogic needed to create.

    sven
